overview: Based on the original novel by Tokuda Shusei, adapted by frequent Masumura scribe (and renowned director in his own right) Kaneto Shindo, this downbeat melodrama features a battle of women for the affections and commitment of the same man, a handsome car salesman. Masuko (Ayako Wakao) is the number one hostess at a cabaret, living with her lover, ... but finds out that he has a wife.  When Masuko’s niece arrives the competition further ratchets up. (Also occasionally known in English as “Inflamation”)
title: Stolen Pleasure
